verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump ’s firing of Secretary of State Rex Tillerson] [V: opens] [ARG1: the door for his ally Mike Pompeo to step into the role] .
President Donald Trump ’s firing of Secretary of State Rex Tillerson opens the door for [ARG1: his ally Mike Pompeo] to [V: step] [ARG2: into the role] .
